item.title: MIUI V14.0.27.0.TMBCNXM Fastboot update for Xiaomi 13 Pro China
item.description:
New Stable Fastboot update available!

Device: Xiaomi 13 Pro China

Codename: nuwa

Version: V14.0.27.0.TMBCNXM | 13.0

Size: 8.4 GB

MD5: fa5a2e045ceb84e6c1be1a75e0f96615

Changelog:
[System]
Dual SIM options for boosting data speed, professional photo printing, and more
[Camera]
New: LEICA SEPIA and LEICA BLUE filters
Enhanced Camera experience, streamlined controls, and improved visuals
Short video, vlogs, and dual video features are now combined into the "Short film" module
